actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the recycling of lubricating oil by repealing the provisions which allow the repayment of the excise tax imposed on lubricating oil not used in highway motor vehicles.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code which allow the repayment of the excise tax imposed on lubricating oil not used in highway motor vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the recycling of lubricating oil by repealing the provisions which allow the repayment of the excise tax imposed on lubricating oil not used in highway motor vehicles.
